Text: Naharin:  The New Kingdom 18th dynasty was in conflict with the kingdom of Mitanni for control of the Levant from the reigns of Thutmose I,  Thutmose III  and Amenhotep II.
Triplets:<The New Kingdom
Thutmose I, Thutmose III, and Amenhotep II
4:
--------------------
Text: Naharin:  The military annals of pharaoh Thutmose III refer to Naharin in explicit terms.
Triplets:<Naharin
